    • onMessage

      public void onMessage​(SocketConnection sockConnection, java.lang.String msg)
      If serverLobby = -1 means that the client it's not in a game yet, so it must be a Connection or AskLobby If serverLobby != -1 the correct serverLobby will be called, and it will handle the request
      Parameters:
      sockConnection - Client that is sending the message
      msg - String msg wrote by the client
